Manterror/Injector/Double Punch/Smokescreen/Beachcomber/Sixshot/Koga 
Shuko/Unitron/Hades/Anubis/Serpentor:




Manterror and Injector moved to the sideletting the missile pass harmlessly 
by them.  

Manterror looked to Cyber Claw.  "Megatron...try the Predacon base!  I 
swear...some robots are just dense..."

Double Punch, Injector, and Manterror lined up 8 feet from the edge of the 
cliff.

"Fire!" the in cloak Double Punch ordered.  Loud noises echoed downwards to 
the Ark, two stinger missiles, two energy-signature seeking missiles, and 
four ion disks all lanced out at the Autobot craft, in a kind of wave.

---

Sixshot got a target lock on the Ark.  He was surprised as weapons fire 
headed for the Ark.  Hell Beast's Predacons (of course, Sixshot didn't know 
who the forces belonged to).  Preparing to fire, he felt a few bolts strike 
the bottom of his current space fighter mode.  Some of the systems began to 
shut down, at the same time the missiles and two neutron bombs launched, 
though the neutron bombs and two missiles veered off course to 50 ft away 
from the Ark's starboard hull section, thought still close enough to possibly 
do some damage.  But the other two missiles headed towards the middle of the 
top of the Ark, Sixshot slowly losing altitude.

---

Smokescreen winced as he saw missiles head for the Ark.  Four out of six gone 
isn't that bad.  He hoped.  He continued up the cliff, two thirds of the way 
to the attacking Preds.

---

Beachcomber saw the blasts head for the Ark.  "Slag!" he yelled, firing a 
worthless pot shots up at where the Preds were, though he couldn't even see 
them.  He continued up the cliff.

===

Koga Shuko acivated his intercom.  "All forces, meet outside.  We are going 
to attack Hell Beast's worthless base.  Assemble quickly." he ordered, 
Unitorn, Hades, Anubis, and Serpentor followed him towards the outside of the 
Newcomer's base.
